verses.verse: Hear<WH8085> my prayer,<WH8605> Yahweh.<WH3068> Listen<WH238> to my petitions.<WH8469> In your faithfulness<WH530> and righteousness,<WH6666> relieve me.<WH6030>
Don't<WH935> enter into judgment<WH4941> with your servant,<WH5650> for in your sight<WH6440> no man living<WH2416> is righteous.<WH6663>

For the enemy<WH341> pursues<WH7291> my soul.<WH5315> He has struck<WH1792> my life<WH2416> down<WH1792> to the ground.<WH776> He has made me live<WH3427> in dark<WH4285> places,<WH5769> as those who have been long dead.<WH4191>
Therefore my spirit<WH7307> is overwhelmed<WH5848> within me.<WH3820> My heart within<WH8432> me is desolate.<WH8074>
I remember<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of old.<WH6924> I meditate<WH1897> on all your doings.<WH6467> I contemplate<WH7878> the work<WH6467> of your hands.<WH3027>
I spread forth<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> to you.<WH5315> My soul thirsts for you,<WH5889> like a parched land.<WH776> Selah.<WH5542>

Hurry<WH4118> to answer<WH6030> me,<WH3068> Yahweh. My spirit<WH7307> fails.<WH3615> Don't<WH5641> hide your face<WH6440> from me,<WH4911> so that I don't become like those who go down<WH3381> into the pit.<WH953>

Cause me to hear<WH8085> your loving kindness<WH2617> in the morning,<WH1242> for I trust<WH982> in you.<WH3045> Cause me to know the way<WH1870> in which<WH2098> I should walk,<WH3212> for I lift up<WH5375> my soul to you.<WH5315>
Deliver<WH5337> me,<WH3068> Yahweh, from my enemies.<WH341> I flee to you to hide me.<WH3680>
Teach<WH3925> me to do<WH6213> your will,<WH7522> for you are my God.<WH430> Your Spirit<WH7307> is good.<WH2896> Lead<WH5148> me in the land<WH776> of uprightness.<WH4334>
Revive<WH2421> me,<WH3068> Yahweh, for your name<WH8034>'s sake.<WH6666> In your righteousness, bring<WH3318> my soul<WH5315> out of trouble.<WH6869>
In your loving kindness,<WH2617> cut off<WH6789> my enemies,<WH341> and destroy<WH6> all those who afflict<WH6887> my soul,<WH5315> For I am your servant.<WH5650>
